metrics.name: success
metrics.description: Measures whether the agent successfully reaches the goal position, indicating task completion.

metrics.name: spl (Success weighted by Path Length)
metrics.description: Combines success rate and path efficiency, reflecting how effectively the task was completed.

metrics.name: soft_spl
metrics.description: A relaxed version of SPL that allows some margin of error in determining success and efficiency.

metrics.name: collisions
metrics.description: The number of times the agent collides with obstacles in the environment during navigation.
